info.name: HierarchyList
info.description:
Use relative database to create hierarchical search. Use the following page to generate the database:
http://www.askia.com/Downloads/dev/adc/hierarchy/CSVConverter.html
Tested in, major modern browser.
Dependencies: - Database file generated with http://www.askia.com/Downloads/dev/adc/hierarchy/CSVConverter.html
info.author: Mamadou Sy <mamadou@askia.com> Jerome Duparc <jeromed@askia.com>

property.name: Javascript database file path
property.description: Path of the Javascript database file to include in the document. example: ??ResPath??myfile.js

property.name: Database name
property.description: Name of the database example: TOWN

property.name: Values to save
property.description: Name of fields separate with coma and surround by quotes or double-quotes. It indicates the fields to save on the latest level selection. example: "ID","DEP_ID","DEP","CP","VILLE","REGION_ID","REGION"

property.name: HTML Ids prefix
property.description: Prefix of all HTML input Ids where the values will be saved. It may be use if you have several instance of the Hierarchy ADC into the same page. example: item!!CI(1)!!

property.name: Display name of levels
property.description: Label of the dropdown for each levels. Each level must have a display names even if it's an empty name. All names must be surrounded by a double-quotes and separate with coma. example: "Brands", "Models", "Versions"

property.name: Text of first dropdown options
property.description: Text of the first dropdown options for each levels. All textes must be surrounded by a double-quotes and separate with coma. example: "Please select a brands", "Please select a models", "Please select a versions"

property.name: Orientation
property.description: Horizontal or vertical dropdowns orientation

property.name: Horizontal space
property.description: Size of the horizontal space between dropdowns (pixel by default)

property.name: Width of inputs
property.description: Width of the inputs, you can also specified the unit (pixel by default)

property.name: Not supported browser text
property.description: Message to display to the non-supported browser
property.value: Sorry this page uses Javascript code, please enable it.

property.name: No match found caption
property.description: Text to display when no match found in the database

property.name: Height of the list
property.description: Height of the list

property.name: List height dynamic
property.description: Dynamically change the list height

property.name: Use search
property.description: Add the input search

property.name: Filter first level value
property.description: Filter the first level with the corresponding value

property.name: Id of custom search input
property.description: Id of the custom search input example: search

property.name: Label of search input
property.description: Label of the search input Support html syntax

property.name: Search fields
property.description: Name of fields separate with coma and surround by quotes or double-quotes. It indicates in which fields to search example: "CP","VILLE"

property.name: Search at beginning
property.description: Search at the beginning of the field value

property.name: Separator of words in input search
property.description: Separator of words in the input search

property.name: Min characters
property.description: Indicates the minimum number of characters before to perform the search

property.name: Sort matching beginning first
property.description: Sort the results alphabetically matching the beginning of string then alphabetically for contained text

property.name: Use phonetic search
property.description: Use phonetic search, if yes this groups are treated equally Aaàáâãä ; Eeèéêë ; IiïîyY ; Ooöô ; Uuùúûü ; Ccç

property.name: Display first level items
property.description: Display first level items

property.name: Auto select when 1 result found
property.description: Auto select when only one result is found

property.name: Sub-levels visibility
property.description: Visibility of sub-levels when not activated

property.name: Max results
property.description: Indicates the maximum number of results to display in the drop-down. Set 0 for unlimited results
